    • Method Detail

      • addNote

        void addNote(Note noteToAdd)
        The addNote program implements an application that adds a new Note to the NotePad. It checks the array of notes and looks for empty cells (null), where it writes a new note. If all cells are occupied, it calles the method copyOf() which allows you to copy the array, add 5 more empty cells to it and write your notetoAdd to the notes array
        Parameters:
        noteToAdd - Note that you want to add to the notePad
        Since:
        2018-02-11

      • editNote

        void editNote(int index,
              Note newNote)
        editNote program implements an application that allows to rewrite an existing note to another.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of note that needed to be edit.
        newNote - New note that will be recorded in the specific index.
        Since:
        2018-02-11

      • removeNote

        void removeNote(int index)
        removeNote program implements an application that deletes specific Note from the array of notes. It uses the System.arraycopy() method, which copy an array from the specified source array, beginning at the specified position, to the specified position of the destination array.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of note that needed to be deleted.
        Since:
        2018-02-11

      • showAllNotes

        void showAllNotes()
        showAllNotes program implements an application that print all your Notes of the NotePad to the console.
        Since:
        2018-02-11
